name: Soccii-app
body:
# soccii v.0.1.mvp

## Soccii Dashboard

### Site Layout

Public
* Homepage
** Sign Up
** Sign In

Authenticated:
* Dashboard
** Market Indices
** Bottlenose Stats
** Tradingview - quote board widget
** Tradingview - symbol overview widget
** Twitter feed widget
** Soccii Indicators
*** Business
*** Social

** Manage Symbols
*** Add symbol
*** Remove symbols

Services:

* Market Indices Feed API
* Bottlenose API
* Tradingview Widget - quote board
* Tradingview Widget - symbol overview
* Twitter API
* Commits to github: https://github.com/johnwaldron/soccii-app
* Deploy to Heroku: TBD
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
